body.text: Webex Buttons and Cards use [Microsoft's Adaptive Cards](https://adaptivecards.io/) open-source specification to define the content of the card in a JSON object. The Webex Teams clients render cards with a similar look and feel across the clients, letting you put more focus on the content and the interaction and less on the presentation.
A card is defined by creating a JSON object that describes the various Adaptive Card schema elements that should be displayed.
In the next lesson, we will look a little further into what is included in the card data.
